translations: [核] 回旋加速器，粒子回旋加速器

phrs.translation: 回旋共振；[物]回旋加速器谐振
回旋加速频率；回磁频率

sentences.sentence: Today, most cyclotrons are used either for instructional purpose or for isotope production.
sentences.translation: 今天大多数回旋加速器是用在教学上，或者用于同位素生产。

sentences.sentence: According to the longitudinal matching requirement of the HIRFL two cyclotrons, a scheme of the new B1 buncher has been introduced.
sentences.translation: 根据HIRFL加速器的束流纵向匹配要求及实际情况，给出了新B1聚束器腔体的具体设计方案。
